title: Most visited amusement and theme parks in the Asia-Pacific region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Theme Park in the x axis and Attendance in millions in the y axis.
The Attendance in millions is appeared to be the highest at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and lowest at Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
The highest Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan has 14.81 more Attendance in millions than the lowest Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Attendance in millions for 20 number of Theme Parks.
Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan has the highest Attendance in millions and OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China has the lowest Attendance in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Theme Park in the x axis and Attendance in millions in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Attendance in millions for 20 number of Theme Parks.
The Attendance in millions is highest at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and lowest at Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
Second maximum Attendance in millions is found at Theme Park Tokyo Disney Sea Japan.
The highest Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan has 14.81 more Attendance in millions than the lowest Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.

Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan is higher than any other Theme Parks with value 17.91, followed by Tokyo Disney Sea Japan, and Universal Studios Japan. Down to Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China with the lowest value 3.1.
The Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China tends to be 2.57 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Theme Parks, we get total 139.11.
